description:
Framed for a crime he didn`t commit, Keroro gets embroiled in the treasure hunt of a lifetime.  Thanks to Fuyuki`s expertise in detective work and knowledge of mysterious ancient Earth sites, those Vipers don`t stand a chance!  ...Right?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro Takara Sagashi wa Yappa Takarajima Da yo ne de Arimasu
À la recherche du trésor enfoui
ケロロ 宝さがしはやっぱ宝島だよね であります
